name: BPMobileMessaging
summary: Mobile Messaging API Library for iOS RESTful API for chat and voice interactions
description: Mobile Messaging API Library for iOS is a RESTful API that allows developers to integrate chat and voice interactions with mobile devices or third-party applications. This API can be used for development of rich contact applications, such as customer-facing mobile and web applications for advanced chat, voice, and video communications with Bright Pattern Contact Center-based contact centers
